backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing recent UI feature changes and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains human‑written summaries of key frontend files including App.tsx, index.css, Tailwind config, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining global OKLCH color variables and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main interactive Valentine proposal UI with moving No button, meme‑cycle modal logic, and Good Choice modal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and updates a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider handling login, stored identity loading, and state exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since the frontend has no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Frontend theme and animation styles with romantic OKLCH palette and Navera highlight effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color system via CSS variables, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and requirements for a romantic interactive Valentine webpage, including features, images, and architectural notes.
